cookie-usage: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of the website and to enhance your online experience. You can choose for each category to opt-in/out whenever you want.
login-span1: User login. If you don’t have an account, one will be created for you after logging in with your email.
login-span2: Introducing passwordless login! You no longer need a password—logging into Jobs is now easier and more secure.
login-span3: How does it work? Instead of relying on a traditional password, when you log in from a new browser, you’ll receive a code via email. Simply enter the code, and you’re in!
login-span4: Why is it easier and more secure? You no longer need to create and remember complex passwords, nor worry about reusing the same password on different sites.
